headline: I also need to make sure that each field is properly enclosed in double quotes and separated by semicolons. No semicolons inside the fieldsâ€”commas are okay if needed. The first row must be the header: "headline"

content: Scientists have announced a groundbreaking discovery today with the identification of a new planet within our solar system...
